DOC.brief_title: Computed Tomography Coronary Angiography ( CTCA ) Prognostic Registry Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The Project aim pool ( retrospectively ) large population patient suspect coronary artery disease ( CAD ) underwent Computed Tomography Coronary Angiography ( CTCA ) adequately stratify first place . Then investigator able assess incremental value CTCA stratification prevalence disease ( non obstructive/obstructive ) prognosis patient suspect CAD . The added information current evidence reliable extent CTCA define actual burden disease cardiovascular risk . Primary objective - MACE/Major Adverse Cardiovascular Events ( i.e . Cardiac Death , Unstable Angina require Hospitalization , Acute Myocardial Infarction ) - Prevalence cardiovascular risk category shift base coronary plaque burden Secondary objectives - Coronary Revascularizations occur CTCA ( i.e . PCI/Percutaneous Coronary Revascularization CABG/Coronary Artery Bypass Graft ) - Prevalence outlier ( i.e . patient lie completely outside conventional risk stratification ; pt > 3 risk factor CAD CTCA pt risk factor > 5 coronary segment CAD ) Institutional Database use data supply . Data anonimyzed pool ( twill possible detect patient ' identity ) . For reason investigator task patient ' Informed Consent . DESIGN The investigator retrospectively collect data respective Institutional database regard patient underwent CTCA suspect CAD last 4 year . General Inclusion criterion Only patient also Calcium Score ≥64-slice CT technology ( 16-slice CT technology > 4 year follow-up ) Number patient least 100 complete clinical file follow-up Minimum follow-up 12 month Only patient suspect Coronary Artery Disease METHODS Study design patient population This observational retrospective study ( consecutive patient meet inclusion criterion ) patient suspect coronary artery disease refer Institutions evaluation Computed Tomography Coronary Angiography ( CTCA ) start January 2003 . Participating center provide data 16-slice CTCA ( minimum follow-up > 4 year ) superior ( i.e . 64-slice CTCA ; minimum follow-up 12 month ) . Each center provide least 200 patient ( complete file evaluation ) . Patients usually refer symptom ( chest pain , dyspnoea exertion ) and/or abnormal equivocal stress test and/or high cardiovascular risk profile . Exclusion criteria renal failure ( creatinine clearance < 60ml/min ) , know previous reaction iodinate contrast medium pregnancy , history Myocardial Infarction , previous revascularization ( PCI and/or CABG ) . All patient assess interview data collection clinical database Institution presence cardiovascular risk factor symptom . The following risk factor consider : 1 ) Hypertension ( define Arterial Pressure 140/80 mmHg need antihypertensive therapy ) ; 2 ) Hypercholesterolemia ( LDL Cholesterol > 130 mg/dl current treatment lipid-lowering therapy ) ; 3 ) Diabetes Mellitus ( current need antidiabetic insulin therapy ) ; 4 ) Smoking habit ; 5 ) Obesity ( Body Mass Index/BMI > 30 ) ; 6 ) Family history cardiac disease . Symptoms classify symptom , typical chest pain , atypical chest pain , dyspnoea exertion . The pre-test cardiovascular risk patient determine mean Morise risk score . Follow-up Follow-up data patient obtain outpatient visit and/or phone contact and/or data collection clinical database Institution . Minimum follow-up 6 month . Hospital/patients ' record screen occurrence clinical event confirm obtain information . The clinical end-points : 1 ) cardiac death , 2 ) non-fatal acute myocardial infarction , 3 ) unstable angina require hospitalization , 4 ) percutaneous surgical revascularization . Cardiac death define death cause acute myocardial infarction ventricular arrhythmia . Non-fatal myocardial infarction define base criterion typical chest pain , elevate cardiac enzyme level , typical change electrocardiogram . Revascularization define percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) stenting coronary artery bypass surgery ( CABG ) . The end point occurrence one MACE follow-up . Multislice compute tomography data acquisition All examination perform 16-slice high CT system ( Multi-vendor ) . First , prospectively trigger coronary calcium CT data set obtain use standardized CT parameter . Thereafter CTCA perform administration bolus ( 60-100ml ) non ionic contrast material ( Multi-vendor ) flow rate 4-6ml/s depend patient status . All injection perform power injector via antecubital vein follow 50 ml saline bolus chase flow rate . A bolus tracking technique use determine initiation CT data acquisition . CTCA perform best available parameter , depend scanner type generation . The reconstruction slice thickness increment 0.5-0.75mm 0.3-0.5mm respectively . Intra-venous beta-blocker ( e.g . atenolol 5-10mg ) administer patient heart rate > 65 beats/min without contraindication ( know asthma bronchospasm , systolic blood pressure < 100mmHg ) . In addition , nitro-glycerine administer sublingually patient , albeit contraindication ( know significant aortic stenosis , systolic blood pressure < 100mmHg ) . Patients atrial fibrillation frequent premature beat include study . To obtain optimal image quality , datasets reconstruct least two point cardiac cycle use retrospective ECG gating algorithm ( one diastolic cardiac phase usually -350msec R wave one end-systolic phase +275msec ) . In presence motion artefact , case cardiac arrhythmia , additional reconstruction make different time point R-R interval . At time study , tube current modulation use . The estimated radiation dose would 5-20mSv . Axial data set transfer remote workstation ( Multi-vendor ) post-processing subsequent evaluation . CTCA data analysis - Coronary Artery Calcium Score The coronary artery calcium ( CACS ) score assessed application dedicate software ( Multi-vendor ) . Coronary artery calcium identify dense area coronary artery whose attenuation exceed threshold 130 Hounsfield unit ( HU ) . The overall calcium score calculate accord Agatston score algorithm patient . CTCA data analysis - Coronary Artery Atherosclerotic plaque assessment All CTCA angiogram evaluate locally 2 experience board certify observer . In case disagreement , joint reading perform consensus reach . Coronary artery divide 15-16 segment accord modified American Heart Association classification case intermediate branch present add classification . All coronary segment consider analysis . First , segment classify assessable assessable . All assessable segment evaluate presence atherosclerotic plaque . Axial image curve multiplanar reconstruction segmental vasculature utilized assessment . Coronary plaque define describe previously structure > 1mm^2 within and/or adjacent coronary artery lumen clearly distinguishable vessel lumen surround pericardial tissue . Obstructive coronary plaque define plaque result ≥50 % luminal narrowing ; non obstructive plaque define plaque result < 50 % luminal narrowing . Patients classify belong one three group base CTCA finding : 1 ) patient normal coronary artery , 2 ) patient non obstructive coronary artery disease , 3 ) patient obstructive coronary artery disease ( presence least one plaque ≥50 % ) . Statistical analysis Categorical baseline characteristic , express number percentage , compare use chi-square test . Continuous variable , express mean standard deviation ( SD ) , compare use 2-tailed test analysis variance normally distribute mean Kruskal-Wallis method normally distribute . A composite end-point MACE use ( cardiac death , non-fatal infarction , unstable angina ) . Cumulative event rate function time obtain mean Kaplan-Meier method . Event curve MACE compare use log-rank test . Cox regression analysis use identify association clinical characteristic CTCA variables outcome . Univariate multivariate analysis perform identify potential predictor . In multivariate analysis include variable significant univariate analysis . Hazard ratios calculate 95 % confidence interval estimate risk associate particular variable . Statistical analysis perform use Excel 2007 software ( Microsoft , United States ) , MedCalc software ( version 8.0 , United States ) , STATA software ( version 10 , United States ) , SPSS software ( version 12.0 , United States ) . p value < 0.05 consider statistically significant . Incremental value CTCA CACS analyze . Sub-analysis pre-test cardiovascular risk stratification accord Morise score ( low-risk , intermediate risk , high risk ) perform . Sample size Based experience data literature investigator estimate sample size 1000 patient . Considering retrospective nature study , possible end investigator reach population > 1000 patient anyway let study continue expect 2 year duration .
DOC.criteria: Only patient also Calcium Score ≥64slice CT technology ( 16slice CT technology > 4 year followup ) Number patient least 100 complete clinical file followup Minimum followup 12 month Only patient suspect Coronary Artery Disease renal failure ( creatinine clearance < 60ml/min ) know previous reaction iodinate contrast medium pregnancy history Myocardial Infarction previous revascularization ( PCI and/or CABG )
